To reduce the different forms of a word: Reducter diversi formes de un parol a un sol form, por exemple builds/building/built a build, cats a cat, fastest a fast
Pre-cache books after import to increase: Pre-cache books after import to increase opening speed, Koodo will generate a pre-cache version of the original book and save it into your library

This action will remove all the books in: This action will permanently remove all the books in the trash, together with their notes, bookmarks, and digests

Sync function works with third-party clo: Synchronisation function works with third-party cloud storage. You need to change the storage location to the same cloud storage folder on different computers. When you click the sync button, Koodo Reader will automatically upload or download your data from this folder and keep data synchronized across all you computers. Visit our document for more instructions.
Please turn off open books in the main w: Please close open books in the main window first

Use the fonts from your local computer: Use the fonts of your computer
Auto Update relies on GitHub Release for: Auto Actualisar relies on GitHub Release for package hosting, if your internet doesn't have stable connection to GitHub, we highly recommend you to turn off this option

Select any text and click the note butto: Select any text and click Note on the popup menu
Select any text and click the highlight: Select any text and click Highlight on the popup menu

Get rid of window frame, make reader hid: Remover li fenestre cadre, far li lector celar in Word o quelc textu editor, e it ne posse esser detectet. Vu deve setar li position, grandore e stile del lector ante

The book that you read from last time wi: The last book you read will open automatically at launch
All the folded content will be expanded: Omni li plicat contenete va esser expandet in li navigation panel

Open books in the main window: Aperir books in the main window

When opening books in the file manager w: Quande abrir libros in li gerer de files con Koodo, li apertet libros ne va esser adjuntet al biblioteca

When deleting books, they will be delete: When deleting books, they will be permanently deleted instead of being sent to the trash
Hide books already added to the shelf: Celar books already added to the shelf

Use SSL, 1 for use, 0 for not use: Usar SSL, 1 por usar, 0 por ne usar
Thanks for using the developer version,: Mersí por usar li developator version. Lassa un comenta si vu trova problemas. Notar que noi ne posse responder de ci. Por plu rapid support, ples visitar

Modify the storage location of the libra: Modify the storage location of the library, and the library will be moved to the new location. Ples ensure that the new folder is empty
Switch between multiple libraries withou: Cambiar between multiple libraries without affecting the original library. For multi-device synchronization in the free version, please refer to the documentation
Authorization failed, please login again: Autorisation ne successat, ples in-logar denov
Always keep local data when resolving sy: Sempre mantener local data quande resolver sync conflictos
If you update a piece of data that has a: Si vu actualisa un data ja deletet in li nube ante sync, li conflicte apare. In ti casu, noi mantene li nube-data per defaulte. Si vu activa ti option, noi mantene li local data
Encryption failed, error code: Ciffration ne successat, cod de errore

Synchronize books and reading progress a: Synchronisar libros e legprogresso trans omni vor aparates

Please turn off import books as link fir: Ples desactivar import de libros quam ligamentes ante
Default sync option cannot be removed: Li defaulte sync-option ne posse esser removet
This feature is not available in the fre: Ti function ne es disponibil in li free version
Please set default sync option in the se: Ples setar li defaulte sync-option in li parametres
Please add data source in the setting: Ples adjunter un data-fonte in li parametres
Don't automatically pre-cache books for: Ne automaticmen pre-cachear libros por li mobile version pos importation
Upon importing, books will be automatica: Pos importation, libros va esser pre-cacheat automaticmen por fluid access in li mobile version. Tamen, ti procese posse usar plu spacie e prolongar li import. Vu posse ancor far it manualmen
Sync state is occupied by other devices,: Li statu de sync es ocupat per altri aparates; ples provar denov plu tard

PDF files in double page mode does not s: PDF files in mode de du págines ne supporta notar anc
You haven't upgraded to Pro yet: Vu ancor ne ha actualisat a Pro
For just the price of a cup of coffee pe: Por solmen li precio de un tasse de cafe per annu, vu posse continuar gauder li premium functiones e supportar nor developation
Fetch failed, error code: Recuperation ne successat, cod de errore
Login failed, error code: In-logation ne successat, cod de errore
Your data has been exported to your loca: Vor data ha esset exportat al vor local dossier. Vide li documentation por sincronisar a altri aparates. Actualisar a Pro por plu avansat functiones
Your data has been imported from your lo: Vor data ha esset importat ex vor local dossier. Actualisar a Pro por plu avansat functiones
Due to Aliyun Drive's stringent concurre: Pro strikt concurrentie restrictiones de Aliyun Drive, noi ha saltat sync de libros e covres. Ples descargar li libros manualmen per clicar sur ili
Aliyun Drive imposes strict limits on co: Aliyun Drive imposa strikt limites por concurrent downloads. Recomendet es atender 10 secondes ante provar denov.
Overwrite the default link style in the: Superscriber li defaulte ligament stile in li libre
Some S3 services are not compatible with: Quelc S3 servicies ne es compatibil con ambientie de navigator. Si vu have problemas de connection, ples referer a li oficial documentation del provider por instructiones por activar CORS. Anc pro li securitá restrictiones del navigator, li S3 servicie deve esser accessat per HTTPS quande vu visita Koodo Reader per HTTPS.
Due to the limited number of emails we c: Pro li limitat númere de e-postes que noi posse sender chascun die, por prevenir problemas de login pos attinger li limite de sendation, ples assecurar adjunter additional login optiones quam backups pos in-logar.
Failed to send code, error code: Fallit to send code, error code
Redeem failed, error code: Redemtion ne successat, cod de errore
Please click the authorize button below: Ples cliccar li buton Autorisar por autorisar li conto, iniser li credentiales ci, e tande cliccar li buton Ligar
Please login again to update your member: Ples login again to update your membership on this device
Tasks failed after multiple retries, ple: Taskes ne successat pos mult reprises; ples verificar li conexion de rete
The Koodo Reader Docker version does not: Li Docker version de Koodo Reader ne supporta li data-fonte function per defaulte. Vu deve modificar li configuration parametres durant deployment por activar it manualmen. Pro li securitá del navigator, li Docker servicie deve esser accessat per HTTPS quande vu usa Koodo Reader per HTTPS.
Some login options and data sources are: Quelc login optiones e data-fontes ne es disponibil in vor selectet servitor region
Grant access to local folder to save you: Donar access al local dossier por salvar vor data e reducer li risca de data perdita
Continue to store in the browser: Continuar to store in the browser
Failed to get folder access permission: Fallit to get folder access permission
Need to reauthorize the access to direct: Besona reautorisar li access al dossier
Granting access to local folder, please: Dante access al local dossier, ples atender
Please click the allow on every visit bu: Ples click the allow on every visit button to avoid this popup once and for all
Only desktop version supports TTS plugin: Solmen li desktop version supporta li TTS plugin
Disable pagination in book list: Desactivar pagination in lista de libros
We have bypassed the synchronization of: Noi ha transitet li synchronisation del cove del libro por Aliyun Drive; covres va esser descargat automaticmen quande vu aperi li libre li proxim vez.
What are the key points of this chapter: Quo es li punctes principal de ti capitul
Ask anything about reading or learning: Questionar quo-ti-cunc pri lectura o apprentissage
Hi there! I'm happy to help with any que: Salute! Yo es felici por auxiliar con alcun question pri lectura o apprentissage
Hi there! What questions do you have abo: Salute! Quo questiones have vu pri ti capitul?
Recommend me some books from Colleen Hoo: Recomendar me quelc libres de Colleen Hoover
Explain Stoicism and its principles to m: Explicar li stoicisme e su principes a me
Please add data source in the setting-Sy: Ples adjunter un data-fonte in li parametres-Sync and backup first
Broken data detected, please click the s: Rupt data detectet; ples cliccar li parametre buton por restar li sync registros
Enable this option to increase synchroni: Activar ti option por augmentar li synchronisation velocitá. Vor lectura progresso, notas, emfases, marca-págines e altri data concernent lectura va esser archivat e sincronisat per nor nube servicie; vor libros e covres va ancor esser sincronisat per vor adjuntet data-fontes. Desactivar ti option va remover li supra data de nor nube.
Access may be unstable in China: Access posse esser instabil in China
Only WebDAV service provided by Alist is: Solmen li WebDAV servicie providet per Alist es directmen supportat in li navigator. Altri WebDAV servicies debe activar CORS por funcionar corectmen. Anc pro li securitá restrictiones del navigator, li WebDAV servicie deve esser accessat per HTTPS quande vu visita Koodo Reader per HTTPS.
By default, Koodo Reader will automatica: Per defaulte, Koodo Reader va automaticmen sincronisar vor data quande vu aperi li application e quande vu surtir lectura
This endpoint usually don't contain buck: Ti endpoint usualmen ne contene un bucket nómine
Reset main window's position: Reinitialisar li position del fenestre principal
7-days free trial only applies to users: Li 7-dies free trial aplica solmen a usatores qui ha registrat con recomendat e-post providers. Recomendat e-post providers es li sequent
In the future, we will introduce more me: In li futur, noi va introduir plu membra-exclusiv functiones, includente lectura statisticas e automatic synchronisation de vor notas, emfases, lectura progresso, e vocabularium listes a plataformas quam Notion, Obsidian, Logseq, Anki, e plu.
Once you exit the Pro version, you will: Pos vu surtir li Pro version, vu ne va plu poder usar synchronisation e altri premium functiones
When the spacing between two lines of te: Quande li spacie inter du lineas es n vezes del normal, ili va esser divisat in du paragrafes
After hiding the menu button, you can mo: Pos celar li menu buton, vu posse mover li mouse al bord del fenestre por monstrar it denov.
When a line of text is n times the size: Quande un linea de textu es n vezes li grandore del normal textu, it va esser tractat quam titulo
Server path (Please first create this fo: Servitor path (Ples first create this folder manually)
Automatically launch on system startup: Automaticmen lansar al startup del sistema
Language auto-detection may not be accur: Language auto-detection may not be accurate. Ples try selecting the source language manually
Disable auto scroll to next or previous: Desactivar auto-rular al sequent o previ capitul
Desactivar auto-rular al sequent o previ capitul quande attinger li fin del actual capitul
To reduce storage usage, only the book m: Por reducer li usage de stocage, solmen li metadata del libro es descargat per defaulte, e li files del libro ne es descargat. Pos activar ti option, omni files del libro va esser descargat durant synchronisation
Main window will be maximized to fit the: Li fenestre principal va esser maximizat por ajustar al ecran quande lansat
Your Pro trial has expired, please renew: Vor Pro trial ha expirat; ples renovar por continuar usar li Pro functiones
This data source cannot be accessed from: Ti data-fonte ne posse esser accessat del navigator pro politica CORS. Ples cambiar a un altri data-fonte o a un CORS-activat provider.
This data source cannot be accessed due: Ti data-fonte ne posse esser accessat pro securitá politica del navigator. Ples cambiar a un altri data-fonte o HTTPS-basat provider.
Hide page scale button: Celar li buton de págine scala
Hide pdf to text button: Celar li buton PDF a textu
Use file name as book title: Uar li file-nómine quam titulo de libro
With the integration of popular cloud st: Con li integration de popular nube stocage servicies, WebDAV, FTP, SFTP, SMB, Docker e object stocage, omni vor data resta securmen sub vor control
The 115 cloud is only recommended for VI: Li 115 nube es recomendat solmen por VIP usatores, pro que it es quasi ínusabil por free usatores. Anc, pro API problemas con 115 nube, synchronisation posse esser tre lent. Si vu insiste usar 115 nube stocage por sync, on recomanda activar Koodo Sync simultanmen, quo va signicativmen meliorar li synchronisation velocitá.
Request timed out, You may change the se: Request timed out, You may change the server region to China to solve the connection issue in mainland China. Go to Parametres > Conto
Please add a data source in Setting-Sync: Ples adjunter un data-fonte in Parametres-Sync e securcopie
Failed to read file, please refresh and: Fallit to read file, please refresh and grant directory access again
No files found in this folder: Null files trovat in ti dossier
Please make sure the email and code are: Ples assecurar que li e-post e li code es corect
If you didn't receive the verification c: Si vu ne recipet li verification code, ples verificar li spam dossier o usar un altri e-post provider
In order to let you directly manage your: In order to let you directly manage your data in Google Drive, we have deprecated the old Google Drive token. Ples reauthorize Google Drive in the settings. Your new data will be stored in the root directory of your Google Drive, and you can manage it directly in the Google Drive web interface.
